title: Rahu Transit in the 4th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 4th house for Taurus Ascendant unsettles emotional foundations, home dynamics, and inner security. This phase brings restlessness at home, shifting living conditions, or unusual domestic decisions. Emotional satisfaction may feel inconsistent, pushing a redefinition of comfort and belonging. Property matters can involve unconventional choices or sudden changes. Relationship with the mother requires sensitivity. When managed consciously, Rahu helps detach from outdated emotional patterns and create a new sense of inner stability aligned with evolving life needs.
closing: Rahu in the 4th house disrupts comfort to promote emotional evolution. Conscious grounding turns instability into a new form of inner security.
